## Protocol.DOMSnapshot.LayoutTreeNode.domNodeIndex property

The index of the related DOM node in the `domNodes` array returned by `getSnapshot`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
domNodeIndex: integer;
```
